# Job Application Exercises

For Research Scientists (m/f/d) Biomathematical Modeling (#[7578](https://www.genstat.imise.uni-leipzig.de/sites/www.genstat.imise.uni-leipzig.de/files/files/uploads/7578_2-WissMitarb_EN.pdf)) and Technical Assistant (m/f/d) Support for Data Analysis and Biomathematical Modeling (#[7577](https://www.genstat.imise.uni-leipzig.de/sites/www.genstat.imise.uni-leipzig.de/files/files/uploads/7577_1-TechMitarb_EN.pdf)). 

Please solve at least one of the two exercises regarding genetic analyses (**ExeciseGenetics/**) or modelling (**ExeciseModelling/**) for your upcoming interview. Just fork this repository and solve the exercise using R. No additional packages are required.
